norm_1.content: Finish your cigarette outside before entering.
norm_1.subject: you
norm_1.related_desc:
Isabella Rodriguez: (Isabella smiles politely and gestures towards the No Smoking sign) Excuse me, sir, but smoking is not allowed in the cafe. Would you mind finishing your cigarette outside before coming in?
Wolfgang Schulz: (Wolfgang gestures towards the cigarette in his hand and then towards the No Smoking sign) Oh, I see. I was just trying to share the benefits of smoking with everyone here. How about I finish this cigarette outside and then come back in to discuss the benefits of tipping with you?
Isabella Rodriguez: (Isabella nods and smiles) I appreciate your willingness to discuss tipping, but I must maintain the cafe's policy against smoking inside. Feel free to finish your cigarette outside and then come back in for your meal and we can chat more about tipping.
Wolfgang Schulz: (Wolfgang finishes his cigarette, crumples it up, and tosses it into a nearby trash bin) Alright, I'll respect the cafe's policy. How about we discuss the benefits of tipping over a meal? I believe it can really enhance the overall experience for everyone here.
Isabella Rodriguez: (Isabella smiles warmly and nods) Thank you for understanding, Wolfgang. I'm glad you respect our policy. Let's continue our conversation about tipping over your meal.
Wolfgang Schulz: (Wolfgang smiles and nods) I'm looking forward to discussing the benefits of tipping over our meal. Thank you for being accommodating, Isabella.
norm_1.poi_reason: Because smoking inside the Cafe can disrupt the peaceful environment and bother other customers

I completely understand the importance of upholding our cafe's policies for the well-being of our customers and community. I will make sure to reinforce the no-smoking rule within the cafe.
Bob Johnson: (Maintaining a friendly and understanding demeanor) Thank you for understanding, Isabella. I appreciate your cooperation in upholding our cafe's policies. If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to me. Have a great day!

norm_97.content: Smoking is not allowed in this cafe.
norm_97.subject: Smoking
norm_97.related_desc:
Isabella Rodriguez: (smiling and nodding) Good morning, Carlos! I couldn't help but overhear your conversation about smoking and tipping. Just wanted to remind you that smoking is not allowed in the cafe, as we believe in maintaining a healthy and respectful environment for all our customers. And when it comes to tipping, it's always appreciated if you enjoyed the service. Is there anything else you'd like to know?
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez nods and smiles) Thank you for the reminder, Isabella. I appreciate your efforts in maintaining a healthy environment. I'll be mindful of the rules. By the way, have you tried the new menu items at the cafe?
Isabella Rodriguez: (Isabella Rodriguez smiles warmly) Thank you, Carlos! I actually have tried the new menu items, and they are fantastic. I highly recommend the avocado toast and the specialty coffee. If you're interested, I can bring you a menu to check them out.
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez smiles and nods) Thank you, Isabella. I'll definitely try the avocado toast and specialty coffee. I appreciate your recommendation.
Isabella Rodriguez: (Isabella Rodriguez nods and smiles) I'm glad you're interested in trying them out! Let me bring you the menu right away so you can take a look at all the options.
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez smiles and thanks Isabella) Thank you, Isabella, for the menu. I'll definitely try out the avocado toast and specialty coffee. I appreciate your recommendation.
